rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with ample natural light and a foyer that leads to the living area. Vastu compliance suggests placing it in the north direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious, modern open-plan living area with a contemporary interior design. It's placed facing south for optimal sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living room. Ideally positioned eastwards to align with Vastu principles of balance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with an open layout connecting to the dining area. Placed in the south-east corner for auspicious energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small bathroom located near the living area. It adheres to Vastu by avoiding direct alignment with main doors.
